TEXT: e1: Well, I as an employee find it very practical to be able to shop at least on weekends.
CN RELATION: employee, shop on weekends (CapableOf)/shop on weekends, practical (HasProperty)/employee, shop on weekends (Desires)

TEXT: e2: Sure, other people have to work in the shops on the weekend,
CN RELATION: people, work on the weekend (CapableOf)/people, shops (AtLocation)

TEXT: e3: but they can have days off during the week and run errands at their leisure while I'm stuck in the office.
CN RELATION: people, have days off (CapableOf)/people, run errands (CapableOf)/days off, leisure (Causes)/leisure, running errands (Causes)/week days, days off (UsedFor)/work, office (AtLocation)/leisure, work (ObstructedBy)/work, leisure (Antonym)/week days, work (UsedFor)

TEXT: e4: Plus, the state wants me to spend my money,
e5: and how am I supposed to do that when the shops aren't open when I'm off work?
CN RELATION: spend money, closed shops (ObstructedBy)/shops, not open (HasProperty)
